title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Learning-Centered Leadership and Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and basic understanding of school organizational culture
context.additional_context: Emphasis on field-applicable leadership competencies for undergraduate students interested in educational leadership and teacher development

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core dimensions of Learning-Centered Leadership (LCL): fostering supportive environments, promoting collaborative learning, and strengthening reflective practices
Learners can evaluate the mediating effects of trust-based environments (TT) on teacher professional learning (TPL) through case analyses
Learners can design TPL facilitation strategies using LCL implementation frameworks applicable to educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
